feature1.title: Innovative Upgradable Smart Contract
feature1.description: Can't farm with it, can't cook with it. Just secure

feature2.title: Community Focused
feature2.description: Reason for existence: To worship the reborn one. Nothing more, nothing less.

feature3.title: Token Economics
feature3.description: This isn't an NFT, nor a DAO. It just exists...

birth.title: Birth of a Meme
birth.description1: Harambergine is the fusion of a 'sacrificed hero' and the 'essence of memes'. In 2016, Harambe left this world, but never left our memories.
birth.description2: He wandered the spiritual realm of the internet until finding the most inappropriate vessel - an eggplant (ğŸ†). He produces nothing, only laughter and confusion.

legacy.title: Harambe's Legacy
legacy.description: "Die in a zoo, resurrect as a meme." Harambe was a gorilla who died unjustly in 2016, creating a massive impact on internet culture and spawning countless memes. Harambergine carries on this internet legacy in a new form.

symbolism.title: Symbolism of the Eggplant
symbolism.description: The eggplant emoji has various meanings in internet culture. In Harambergine, the eggplant represents the vessel containing Harambe's soul and symbolizes the resurrection of the meme. It may seem inappropriate and useless, but that's the essence of a zoo gorilla.

mission.title: Harambergine's Mission
mission.description: Harambergine aims to go beyond a simple meme coin to honor Harambe's spirit and preserve the essence of internet culture.
mission.guardianDesc: Preserving internet culture and the spirit of memes
mission.practicalityDesc: Most zoos have the same practicality as memes.
mission.resurrectionDesc: Eternally remembering Harambe's soul in an eggplant
mission.quote: "He became an eggplant, and we are his seeds."

info.title: Token Information
info.description: Harambergine token has absolutely no utility. And that is our essence.
info.name: Token Name

features.title: Token Features
features.feature1: Supply that grows like an eggplant
features.feature2: Community as heavy as a gorilla
features.feature3: Special system to control the dump
features.feature4: Our value lies with those who enjoy it

mint.title: Infinite Mint System
mint.step1Desc: When you participate in the presale with ETH or USDT, HBE tokens are minted immediately.
mint.step2Desc: Purchased tokens are immediately transferred to your wallet.
mint.step3Desc: Add the token address to your wallet to immediately verify your purchased tokens.
mint.note: Note: Harambergine uses an infinite mint presale, where new tokens are minted each time you participate in the presale. Eggplant-like supply, gorilla-like community, and slightly crazy holders. Dumping presale? Innovative presale with contract-based protection.

spaceConquest.title: Space Conquest ğŸš€
spaceConquest.description: Haramber gine aims to transcend beyond a simple meme coin to become a transcendent meme entity. Our contract and roadmap are continuously updated based on community feedback and market conditions.
spaceConquest.guardianDesc: Preserving internet culture and the spirit of memes
spaceConquest.revolutionDesc: Who decides the value of Harambe in a zoo?

steps.title: 1. Install a Wallet ğŸ§
steps.description: Prepare a vessel for Harambe's soul. Install MetaMask or Trust Wallet.

steps.title: 2. Load ETH ğŸ’°
steps.description: Prepare the offering to summon the spirit. Buy ETH from an exchange and transfer it to your wallet.

steps.title: 3. Connect Wallet ğŸ”—
steps.description: Connect your soul with Harambe. Connect your wallet to the Harambergine website.

steps.title: 4. Buy Tokens ğŸš€
steps.description: Summon Harambe in eggplant form. Enter the desired ETH amount and purchase HBE tokens.

steps.title: 5. Verify Tokens âœ…
steps.description: You are now a guardian of the meme. Add the token address to your wallet to verify your HBE tokens.

presale.title: Join the Presale
presale.description: Participate in the presale to be among the first to acquire Harambergine tokens. Tokens are minted to your wallet immediately upon purchase.

addToken.title: Add Token to Wallet
addToken.description: After purchase, add the token address to your wallet to immediately verify your tokens. The token address can be found in the presale widget.
addToken.congrats: Now you too have become an eggplant. Congratulations! ğŸ‰
